original_text: I pray this for the tribe of Asher: May the Lord bless Asher's tribe more than the other tribes. May their brothers be pleased with them. May Asher's people be rich enough to wash their feet in olive oil. I pray this for the tribe of Asher: May the Lord bless Asher's tribe more than the other tribes. May their brothers be pleased with them. May Asher's people be rich enough to wash their feet in olive oil. May their brothers be pleased with them. May Asher's people be rich enough to wash their feet in olive oil. I pray this for the tribe of Asher:
korean_text: 아셀에 대하여는 일렀으되 아셀은 아들들 중에 더 복을 받으며 그의 형제에게 기쁨이 되며 그의 발이 기름에 잠길지로다

sentences.original_text: I pray this for the tribe of Asher:
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 아셀 지파를 위해 이렇게 기도합니다:

sentences.original_text: May the Lord bless Asher's tribe
more than the other tribes.
May their brothers be pleased with them.
May Asher's people be rich enough
to wash their feet in olive oil.
